item.title: Deploying ZPA ZEN Connectors
item.description: These notes will cover how to deploy a ZEN Connector for Zscaler Private Access (ZPA)

item.title: Configuring Zscaler Private Access (ZPA) to use Azure AD
item.description: Set Azure Active Directory (AAD) as the Identity Provider (IdP) for the Zscaler Private Access (ZPA) service. Configure SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) and SCIM Provisioning.

item.title: Configuring Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) to use Azure AD
item.description: Set Azure Active Directory (AAD) as the Identity Provider (IdP) for the Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) service. Configure SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) and SCIM Provisioning.

item.title: Set up Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) free for your Homelab
item.description: Configure the free version of Azure AD for your lab environment using your own domain name.

item.title: Deploying Windows Server with an Azure Free Account
item.description: Microsoft allow you one free Windows B1s VM for 12 months as part of the free Azure account. This guide will show you how to deploy Windows Server for lab use within the limits of the free tier.

item.title: How to replace your PS4's HDD and upgrade to an SSD
item.description: Swapping your PS4's Hard Drive (HDD) out for a Solid State Drive (SSD) is a great way to improve performance and breathe new life into your console.

item.title: Zero Touch Provisioning Juniper (Junos OS) devices with Sky Enterprise
item.description: ZTP is a great way to start down the automation path, but is often labelled 'too hard' or 'too complex'. This guide will cover how to ZTP Juniper devices using the Sky Enterprise management platform.

item.title: Connecting Juniper Sky Enterprise to Aerohive HiveManager
item.description: Sky Enterprise can monitor your Aerohive APs, but documentation on how to do so is a bit hard to find. This post will explain how to link Sky Enterprise to HiveManager so that you can monitor your Aerohive APs from within Sky Enterprise.

item.title: Unlocking or changing the super password for Junos Space 17.2, 18.X
item.description: In the 17.2R1 release for Junos Space, the process for unlocking or changing the password for the super account has changed.

item.title: Deploying a multi-node, multi-server Kafka Cluster with Docker
item.description: A Docker deployment of Kafka avoids the need to manually configure each broker and provides a very simple and scalable installation methodology; particularly over multiple servers.
